examples.example: 周末我和家人一起去超市采购，度过了愉快的时光。

translate.english: On the weekend, I went to the supermarket to purchase with my family and had a pleasant time.

examples.example: 我经常去超市购买新鲜的食材，为家人烹饪美味的饭菜。

translate.english: I often go to the supermarket to buy fresh ingredients and cook delicious meals for my family.

examples.example: 今天下班后我去超市买了很多生活用品，感觉很满足。

translate.english: After work today, I went to the supermarket to buy a lot of daily necessities and felt very satisfied.
